product_desc:
Spaceez is a hospitality industry media platform with mobile app, a visual community featuring interior and exterior photos of hospitality CRE design, development and renovation projects by industry professionals from US around the world. The platform gives the entire hospitality CRE ecosystem a voice by enabling them to publish their own original content, make product recommendations, collaborate with clients utilizing digital tools and build a social media community for the industry. For designing, developing or renovating a hotel, resort, restaurant, bar, spa and everything in the hospitality CRE, Spaceez is the only platform for this industry to inspire, connect and collaborate.

We do this with:
High quality content
Building a community
Platform to market and advertise for the industry
high_concept: Inspire and be inspired to design hospitality spaces
name: spaceez
